basics.name: Brooke Alexis Hanger
basics.label: Account Executive – Cloud & AI Solutions
basics.summary: Multilingual Account Executive with experience in B2B sales, cloud infrastructure, AI solutions, nonprofit leadership, and education. Proven ability to drive revenue through consultative selling, pipeline management, CRM optimization, and cross-functional collaboration. Strong alignment with Salesforce digital strategy and AI commercialization.
